thread.title: Mukesh Ambani announces launch of Reliance Jio Prime, members to get unlimited benefits at Rs 303 per month, effectively Rs 10 per day - The Financial Express
thread.title_full: Mukesh Ambani announces launch of Reliance Jio Prime, members to get unlimited benefits at Rs 303 per month, effectively Rs 10 per day - The Financial Express

author: Fe Online
title: Mukesh Ambani announces launch of Reliance Jio Prime, members to get unlimited benefits at Rs 303 per month, effectively Rs 10 per day - The Financial Express
text:
Industry Mukesh Ambani announces launch of Reliance Jio Prime, members to get unlimited benefits at Rs 303 per month, effectively Rs 10 per day Mukesh Ambani announces launch of Reliance Jio Prime, members to get unlimited benefits at Rs 303 per month, effectively Rs 10 per day Mukesh Ambani on Tuesday announced a new Jio Prime membership programme, that will open from March 1 and will remain open till March 31. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: February 21, 2017 2:53 PM Mukesh Ambani at a press conference. (ANI) 
Reliance Industries Chairman Mukesh Ambani on Tuesday announced a new Jio Prime membership programme, that will open from March 1 and will remain open till March 31. All new customer who joins before March 31 this year at a one-time membership fees of Rs 99. He said that “We are committed to serving you and winning your confidence every single day. All the Jio Prime Members can continue enjoying the unlimited benefits of ‘Jio New Year Offer’ until 31st March, 2018 and can get tremendous value at an introductory price of only Rs 303/month, effectively just Rs 10/day.” 
He also said, “Today I show my gratitude to you, the initial 100Million on Jio and to ensure you always continue to get extreme valueYour invaluable and constructive feedback inspired us to set new benchmarks in customer experience and technical excellence. Jio was conceived to be a steadfast partner to India, and Indians, in our digital transformation. To all our customers, I say thank you. With Jio, your life is digital, and your life is beautiful” 
You may also want to watch- 
In just 170 days, Jio crossed the mark of 100 million customers on its 4G LTE network adding nearly 7 customers to its network every second of everyday. More than 100 Cr GB of data was consumed by Jio users every month on the Jio network which adds to more than 3.3Cr GB a day. Jio surpasses the number of 4G base stations in India as compared to that of all the other operators put together. 5.5 crore hours of daily video is carried by Jio on its network and its Aadhaar-based process makes the initiation of Mobile Number Portability simpler and faster. All domestic voice calls will always remain free and there will be no roaming charges on its network for all of its tarrif plans. 
Reliance Industries, India’s largest business conglomerate, launched its much awaited telecommunication venture Reliance Jio Infocomm last year with a whopping Rs 1.5 trillion investments to start with, mainly in building high-speed internet infrastructure over the new 4G/LTE network across the entire country.
